name: water-absorb
effect: Whenever a water-type move hits this Pokémon, it heals for 1/4 of its maximum HP, negating any other effect on it. Water moves will ignore this Pokémon's substitute.
short_effect: Absorbs water moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.
flavor_text.x_y: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.
